title: Getting penalized from someone else dodging a ranked que
body: I was just sitting in a ranked que, picked my champ, then before I could even lock in someone dodged and i re signed in, lost a little LP and have a time ban, Im really glad you penalized me instead of the person that dodged, if you did something with logic that would be very un riot like, also I have reported several accounts to people making fun of disabled people and claiming to be peadophiles, im curious as to why riot supports those kinds of players? thats disgusting....

replies.body: You wouldn't have had to resign in if someone else dodged, you would have only been kicked back to the splash page. Is it possible your client crashed causing the dodge? That would be the most likely scenario for you to have to log back in, and would count as a dodge on your part hence the penalties.
after they dodged and it did the que wait thing my thing stopped responding all really fast, so nah my thing didnt crash, was someone else, rip

Then your best  bet is probably to submit a ticket about it. From that, my best guess would be a disconnect (as they don't always immediately close the client, but one would likely kick you out of the lobby) followed by the client getting confused and not knowing what to do. 

Either way, your client was disconnected from the lobby by some means or another which marked you as having dodged, and since I don't know enough about it, support is probably your best bet for an answer there. If you have any screenshots to add to the ticket it'd help support out a lot too.
